description.original: Customize your workspace by adding commands everywhere, create Macros and supercharge your mobile toolbar.
description.translation: Customize your workspace by adding commands everywhere, create Macros and supercharge your mobile toolbar.

dict..setDesc(\"Set how many Rows the Mobile: .setDesc("Set how many Rows the Mobile Toolbar should have. Set this to 0 to remove the Toolbar.")
dict..setDesc(\"Use a column based layout ins: .setDesc("Use a column based layout instead of the default row. This makes it easier to arrange the Commands.")
dict..setDesc(\"Offset the Toolbar from the B: .setDesc("Offset the Toolbar from the Bottom of the Screen. This is useful if the toolbar is partially obscured by other UI Elements.")
dict..setDesc(\"Change the Height of each But: .setDesc("Change the Height of each Button inside the Mobile Toolbar (in px).")
dict..setDesc(\"Change the Width of each Butt: .setDesc("Change the Width of each Button inside the Mobile Toolbar (in px).")
dict..setDesc(\"Some Themes need extra spacin: .setDesc("Some Themes need extra spacing in the toolbar. If your Toolbar doesn't wrap properly, try increasing this value.")
dict.\"As of Obsidian 0.16.0 you need to expl: "As of Obsidian 0.16.0 you need to explicitly enable the View Header."
dict.\"As of Obsidian 1.1.0 you can reorder t: "As of Obsidian 1.1.0 you can reorder the Buttons in the left ribbon by dragging. This will replace the old sorting feature."
dict.\"As of Obsidian 0.16.0 you need to expl: "As of Obsidian 0.16.0 you need to explicitly enable the Tab Title Bar. Once enabled, you might need to restart Obsidian."
dict.\"When clicking on a Command in the Expl: "When clicking on a Command in the Explorer, the Explorer view will become focused. This might interfere with Commands that are supposed to be executed on an active File/Explorer."
dict.\"The Toolbar is only available in Obsid: "The Toolbar is only available in Obsidian Mobile. "
dict.setDesc(\"Set how many Rows the Mobile T: setDesc("Set how many Rows the Mobile Toolbar should have. Set this to 0 to remove the Toolbar."
dict.setDesc(\"Use a column based layout inst: setDesc("Use a column based layout instead of the default row. This makes it easier to arrange the Commands."
dict.setDesc(\"Offset the Toolbar from the Bo: setDesc("Offset the Toolbar from the Bottom of the Screen. This is useful if the toolbar is partially obscured by other UI Elements."
dict.setDesc(\"Change the Height of each Butt: setDesc("Change the Height of each Button inside the Mobile Toolbar (in px)."
dict.setDesc(\"Change the Width of each Butto: setDesc("Change the Width of each Button inside the Mobile Toolbar (in px)."
dict.setDesc(\"Some Themes need extra spacing: setDesc("Some Themes need extra spacing in the toolbar. If your Toolbar doesn't wrap properly, try increasing this value."
dict.\"To configure which Commands show up in: "To configure which Commands show up in the Toolbar, open the Mobile Settings."
dict.Show the \"Add Command\" Button in every: Show the "Add Command" Button in every Menu. Requires restart.'
dict.description:'Show the \"Add Command\" Bu: description:'Show the "Add Command" Button in every Menu.'
